tool_description: An Api showing all the latest Climate Changes around the world
name: My First
title: My First

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about climate changes from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://my-first9.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-first9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://my-first9.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-first9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Changes News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about climate changes around world
